section.title: Overview
section.lines: This page provides information on the User authorisation management within the CM Portal.

section.title: Purpose of this Feature
section.lines: Is to manage user authorisation to ensure secure, authorised access only according to need to Configuration management services using Role and Attribute based access control.

section.title: Edit a users User Role or Attribute authorisation

ol.li: When logged in as an Admin or Super-Admin, the user must click on the side Menu.
From the revealed menu, click on 'User Management', then 'Users'.
In the 'Users' page, click on 'Edit' button.
To modify the User Role: from the dropdown menu select the new role.

To grant access to a specific Attribute or feature that may not be authorised by the Users assigned User Role: Click on the button 'Add Permission'. Enter the path name to grant access to (e.g : /test). From 'Actions' check-boxes select the type of actions the user will be permitted to perform. Note: 'get': grants view permissions only, 'put': grants update permissions, 'post': grants create permissions and 'delete' grants delete permissions.
Click 'Save'. This user details are now updated.

section.lines: NOTE: Only users who have logged into CM Portal at least once are listed.
